title: Client
body: Not sure if it is my client alone or others as well but I've been having quite a few issues. It has been incredibly slow for no reason what so ever. I have asked others in lobby if this has happened to them as well, and I have gotten quite a few "Yeses". This has been happening ever since the star of worlds and is incredibly frustrating.

replies.body:
Hey MrGinger1004, 

If your Client is running slow and it has been a continuous issue you may wanna try Riots Connection KB. It helped me figure out the issues with my computer and client. Not saying there is something wrong with your computer xD. Give it a whack and see if it helps.

COnnection KB: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

Hope this fixes your issue from one Ginger to another xD
